quote: Dialogic is not to be identified with love. But love without dialogic, without real outgoing to the other, reaching to the other, the love remaining with itself - this is called Lucifer.
quote_letters: DIALOGIC IS NOT TO BE IDENTIFIED WITH LOVE BUT LOVE WITHOUT DIALOGIC WITHOUT REAL OUTGOING TO THE OTHER REACHING TO THE OTHER THE LOVE REMAINING WITH ITSELF - THIS IS CALLED LUCIFER
